fields.name: Sell Insurance (1x, Charge 80%):
fields.value: During the evening phase, choose a target and a subject. At the beginning of the night phase, the target will be informed that they must use an ability on the subject, or their score will be cut in half the coming evening, and they will be astrally roleblocked if the coming night if their effective score is below 25% that evening.

fields.name: Squeeze (2x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. During the evening phase, choose a target and a subject. At the beginning of the night phase, the target will be informed that they must use an ability on the subject, or they will Regret It™ (be silenced the next day, and then astrally roleblocked and attacked the following night). If the player does Regret It™, this ability is re-locked.

fields.name: Underwriting (Passive):
fields.value: If the Extortionist's target cannot use an ability on a subject, their action silently fails and no ammo is spent.
